title: Bump typescript from 5.8.3 to 6.0.0
body:
Bumps [typescript](https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript) from 5.8.3 to 6.0.0.

**Release notes**
*Sourced from [TypeScript's releases](https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/releases).*

> ## TypeScript 6.0.0
> ### Breaking Changes
> - Removed support for legacy module resolution
> - Changed default target to ES2022
> - Stricter type checking for function parameters
> - Removed deprecated compiler options
> 
> ### New Features
> - Enhanced type inference
> - New utility types
> - Improved performance

**Migration Guide**
This is a major version update with breaking changes. Please review:
- Update tsconfig.json target and module settings
- Review type errors that may surface
- Test thoroughly before merging

**Commits**
- [`major123`](https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/commit/major123) TypeScript 6.0.0 release

---
**⚠️ BREAKING CHANGES DETECTED**

This is a major version update that includes breaking changes. Manual review is required before merging.

**Dependabot compatibility score**

Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`.
